episode_title: Transforming functions for realization with specific gates

script.voice_line: I can't believe I'm saying this, but math is actually kind of interesting. Thank you for showing us the power and beauty of functions and gates.
You're welcome, Alice. I'm glad you're starting to see the value in mathematics. Remember, there's always more to discover and explore in this world of ours.

This has been a fascinating journey for me as well. I've always admired the way mathematics can reveal hidden patterns and structures in our world. It's like a key that unlocks the mysteries of existence.
